messages.message: Hey team, I wanted to use grafana to run a query on the database used by Crafting Cypress env. However, no tables are available for the MySQL datasource and when I run the following query (https://crafting-cyp.test.instabase.com/grafana/goto/Un-E2zbHg?orgId=1) (via code), I get this error: `db query error: failed to connect to server - please inspect Grafana server log for details`. My initial question is is grafana connected to the database on the crafting env? From a larger context, I want to run this (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/f4fc122ab7afe91605ba69e85e326e97c11e2b51/shared-utils/go-utils/src/instabase/utils/db/accessor/mount_point_accessor.go#L738-L762) query

grafana isn't connected to the db in most environments

you should be able to access the db by ssh-ing into a crafting cyp sandbox and using kubectl (example below)
• `cs ssh -W pr-70141-cypress/dev`
• `kubectl get pods --namespace=intes-use2-crafting-cyp-instabase`
• then follow https://instabase.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/ENG/pages/2582773768/Database+-+Runbook+Troubleshooting#Connecting-to-a-SaaS-Database
